text: Saharanpur State University (Hindi: सहारनपुर राज्य विश्वविद्यालय) is a state university in Saharanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India established by The Uttar Pradesh State Universities (Amendment) Act, 2019. It is expected to open in 2020. It will give affiliation to all government and private degree colleges in the districts of Saharanpur, Muzaffarnagar and Shamli who are currently affiliated with Chaudhary Charan Singh University. It will be established by upgrading existing Government Degree College, Punwarka (established in 1999). ==References== ==External links== *University act Category:Proposed organizations Category:Universities in Uttar Pradesh Category:Education in Saharanpur Category:Proposed infrastructure in Uttar Pradesh
title: Saharanpur State University
